task.title: Importing a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: Import a pipeline to use a pipeline developed on a different or to restore a backup file. Import a pipeline from a pipeline file. Pipeline files are JSON files exported from a instance.

taskbody.context: pipelinesimportingYou can import a pipeline to the current canvas, overwriting the existing pipeline. Or you can create a new pipeline as you import the pipeline.

step.cmd: In the Pipeline library, click the Actions icon for the pipeline, and then click Import.
To import the pipeline in the current canvas and overwrite the existing pipeline, in the Import Pipeline window, click Overwrite Pipeline. Browse to the pipeline file and click Import.

To create a new pipeline as you import the pipeline, click Create New Pipeline and Import. In the New Pipeline dialog box, enter a pipeline name and optional description. Browse to the pipeline file and click Import.
